My learning log

Never stop learning!

  • 2020
  • 2019
  • 2018

I want to be an expert in Data Science and Artificial Intelligence and below are what I’ve learned/done so far to achieve it.

Finished tasks! Ongoing tasks! Come back later! Interrupted tasks!

2020

  • Data & ML Wowrking with Time Series: DTW, using TensorFlow and Pytorch, clustering, anomaly detection, prediction,…
  • Tech Infrastructure: Docker, Docker with GPU + Tensorflow + PyTorch, Airflow, gRPC, k8s,…
  • Data & ML Clustering methods: HDBSCAN/DBSCAN, Mean Shift, …
  • Data & ML Metrics: Silhouette Score, Calinski and Harabasz, Rand Index, Adjusted Rand Index,…
  • Data & ML Dimention reduction: UMAP, t-SNE,…
  • Workflow Tools: Aha!, Trello, Miro.
  • Data & ML Processing raw data: 4 projects at Dataswati.
  • Tech Created & Discussing on P13 Discussion Group, a group of Vietnamese students from University Sorbonne Paris Nord. We share knowledge and discuss mainly on Information Technology – Group’s Github Repository (private).
  • Data & ML Courses – my certificates.
    • Leveraging Cloud-Based Machine Learning on Google Cloud Platform: Real World Applications on LinkedIn Learning.
    • Specialization Deep Learning (5 courses) taught by Andrew NG on Coursera.
    • Specialization DeepLearning.AI TensorFlow Developer (4 courses) taught by Laurence Moroney on Coursera.
    • Anomaly Detection in Time Series Data with Keras on Coursera.
  • Python Python Coding: Sphinx Documentation Generator, Pytest, build AI services (Dataswati’s tasks), Data Controller using gRPC + Airflow + MongoDB + SQL + InfluxDB, Abstract model,…

  • Data & ML Get a job at Dataswati as a Data Scientist. – interview tests.
  • Data & ML Data Science path on Codecademy (They have just updated their courses).
  • Data & ML Finish Learn SQL path on Codecademy.
  • Data & ML Finish IBM Data Professional Certificate on Coursera (9 courses).
  • Python Finish the course Learn Python 3 on Codecademy. My achievement.
  • Web Finish the course Introduction to HTML on Codecademy. My achievement.
  • Web Design a new theme for Math2IT (a Wordpress theme). My achievement.
  • Web Self-studying to build a Wordpress theme from scratch. My achievement.
  • Web Learn to create website with GatsbyJS – my gatsby notes.
  • Web Create a Back-End App with JavaScript on Codecademy.
  • French Follow a summer French course at CMA, Mairie de Paris (60 hours in 3 weeks).
  • Web Change my personal website dinhanhthi.com which contains better notes about Data Science, Machine Learng and Web-Dev. Along with these “raw” notes rawnote.dinhanhthi.com, I use this site for more well-organized technical ones.
  • French French Marathon Challenge on Lingoda.
  • French French courses (Oral Expression level B1, French Phonetic level B1) at CMA, Mairie de Paris.

2018

  • PhD Finish my PhD project. My achievement.
